mapper.update: UPDATE restaurants r SET r.status = 'CLOSED' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM regular_holidays rh WHERE rh.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id AND rh.day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek} ) AND r.status != 'DELETED'
UPDATE restaurants r SET r.status = 'OPEN' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM regular_holidays rh WHERE rh.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id AND rh.day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek} ) AND r.status != 'DELETED'
